The Alignment App¶

Welcome to the Alignment App’s documentation. Get started with Getting Started. Make sure you utilize the included Testing the App.

The most comprehensive section of the documentation can be found in API. The Alignment App depends heavily on the Flask microframework. The documentation for this library can be found here: Flask documentation

Quickstart and Testing¶

This part of the documentation will get the user up and running as quickly as possible.

    • Installation
  • Testing the App

If you are looking for information on a specific function, class or method, this part of the documentation is for you.
